info.title: MessageControl Plugin
info.description: The MessageControl plugin allows reading of the traces from WPEFramework, and controlling them tracing and logging. Allows for outputting logging messages to the websocket

console.description: Enables message output messages to the console

filepath.description: Path to file (inside VolatilePath) where messages will be stored

abbreviated.description: Denotes if the messages should be abbreviated

maxexportconnections.description: Specifies to how many websockets can the messages be outputted
